channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter bin overflowing, 11th September
item.description:
This litter bin next to Bus Stop SM on Shooters Hill has been full for several days now and urgently needs to be emptied as it is overflowing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Harrison Walk, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog bags and chestnut litter, 11th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Acacia Road, Belsize Park, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smashed glass, rubbish and an abandoned trolley, 11th September
item.description:
I have reported this multiple times, yet it's still there months later. There is so much glass on that incline that I have to carry my dog over it. The rubbish is increasing, too. Could the rubbish and the glass finally be removed? PLEASE! The glass is a danger to dogs and cyclists. This is on the Thames Path, behind the flats under construction on West Street, next to Ocean Park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Corinthian Manorway, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Racially motivated addition to lamppost., 11th September
item.description:
A flag has been attached to a lamppost on the approach to a local school. As per the news, this is clearly to cause division and disharmony in the community and families and children should not have to feel threatened by it, on their walk, to and from school/the park.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malling Way, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bumper of car, 11th September
item.description:
The front of a car and Bumper has been left on the pavement junction of Heron Hill and Lessness park near the gate to the recreation ground, please remove this as it was further down the road but is being moved around.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heron Hill, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose Manhole cover/drain, 11th September
item.description:
This has been going on for 9 months - everytime a car drives over the man-hole cover, it makes a crazy loud noise. Please fix this ASAP. It is affecting residents wellbeing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Boundary Lane, Walworth, London

item.title: Lime bikes blocking drop kerb, blocking access to pedestrians., 11th September
item.description:
Lime bikes completely blocking the pavement making it inaccessible to users and dangerous to those with disabilities as pictured. Drop kerb is blocked, no place to cross using pedestrian crossing. This is dangerous and unacceptable

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Cheapside, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Open cabinet in front of nursery, 11th September
item.description:
This cabinet in the pavement in front of the the LEYF Camberwell nursery is open, with cables and wires exposed. Can you please ensure that it’s closed/repaired ASAP before there’s an accident with any of the children in the nursery?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell Grove, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
